channel.title: Creations on Yinbo Yu
channel.description: Recent content in Creations on Yinbo Yu

item.title: Automatically specifying and verify cellular network protocols
item.description: CellScope is a specification and verification framework, CellScope, for exploiting design flawsin cellular network protocols. CellScope consists two major components: a parser frontend and a verification backend. The parser front-end automatically translates LTE source code to formal models and instruments channel and adversary models into LTE models. By slicing the model depending on a property, CellScope performs the CEGAR-based verification backend on it. Once a counterexample is identified, it will be validated on a real OAI testbed platform.

item.title: Automatically Discovering and Repairing Security issues in configurable implementations of Cellular networks
item.description: Multiple plugins used by thousands of teams that provide enhanced functionality of Atlassianâ€™s core products (primarily JIRA and Bamboo) to enrich CI/CD capabilities, DevOps automation, or productivity. Functionality spans user interface, web services and persistence.
